description: 1) backend/src/config/index.ts: THUMBNAIL_SIZE default 200->400, THUMBNAIL_QUALITY default 70->80. 2) stage2-etl-service.ts: cambiar resize() a solo ancho (.resize({ width: cacheConfig.thumbnailSize, withoutEnlargement: true })). 3) executions.ts: agregar Cache-Control: public, max-age=31536000, immutable antes de res.sendFile() en getExecutionThumbnail y getExecutionImage.
title: Update Sharp config defaults and add Cache-Control headers
